Today is the eve of the Year of the Tiger. I send my best wishes to my fellow compatriots back home, here in UK and wherever they are in the world, and to my British friends from all sectors:  I wish you happiness, health and prosperity!

President Xi Jinping: The Olympic Winter Games #Beijing2022 will be held on schedule as promised. This is the first time since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic that a comprehensive global sporting event is held as scheduled.

China will continue to let the market play a decisive role in resource allocation. 
We will build a unified, open, competitive and orderly market system, where all businesses enjoy equal status before the law and have equal opportunities in the marketplace.

China will continue to expand high-standard opening-up, 
-steadily advancing institutional opening-up that covers rules, management and standards
-delivering national treatment for foreign businesses
-promoting high-quality Belt and Road cooperation.

-help build global synergy for 2030 SDGs & balanced, coordinated & inclusive devt

A favourable political environment, I said, is needed for such potential to bear fruit.

-20% by 2025

-Develop renewable energy

Wang Yi: Devt of China-UK relations goes beyond bilateral scope & has crucial regional & int‚Äôl impacts.

-average life expectancy from 35 to 72 years

- >300-time growth in economic output

annotations.normalized_text: Fostering a Commitment of Life for Man and Nature

tweets.text:
The Eco Forum Global Guyang 2021 opened on 12 July. The theme of this year‚Äôs forum - ‚ÄúGreen and Low-Carbon Development: Fostering a Commitment of Life for Man and Nature‚Äù - is most fitting.
https://t.co/KZARLp4ol7

China's only national-level global forum themed on ecological civilization, Eco Forum Global Guiyang 2021, has opened in Guiyang, southwest China's Guizhou. The country is expanding the use of new energy to meet its 2060 carbon-neutral target. #GLOBALink https://t.co/dDlSvk58C5

12 radio programmes in Xinjiang broadcast in Mandarin, Uyghur, Kazakh, Kirghiz, and Mongolian. Elementary & secondary schools offer Uyghur, Kazakh, Kirghiz, Mongolian and Xibe language courses to ethnic minority students.
Some naked truths: from 2010 to 2020, Uyghur population there grew by over 1.62 mln. In the past over 60 years, average life expectancy rose from 30 to 72 years, and GDP increased by over 200 folds.

There is no so-called ‚Äúinternment camps‚Äù in Xinjiang, only institutions similar to the Desistance and Disengagement Programme (DDP) of UK or de-radicalization centres in France. There is no so-called "forced labour" in the region, only voluntary employment & free choice.
What the Chinese government has been doing there is to counter and prevent terrorism & religious extremism and promote ethnic harmony & national unity.

The recent report by the Foreign Affairs Committee of UK House of Commons targeting China‚Äôs Xinjiang is politically motivated and full of disinformation and prejudice against China. https://t.co/zF2nYg7V1S

China's installed clean energy power generation capacity increased to 1.08 billion kW by the end of 2020, accounting for nearly half of the country's total installed power generation capacity https://t.co/RKRpGpZ7Dx https://t.co/PUXTBUZoxf

The cotton and textile industry in China's Xinjiang has shown resilience by further tapping markets and winning over more customers with its superior quality. Why has the Western mudslinging failed to dampen Xinjiang cotton? Read Xinhua Headlines: https://t.co/ds751tFtZs https://t.co/cQQLwCFJre

urls.title: Uygur residents refute accusations of 'genocide' in Xinjiang
urls.description: Uygur residents in northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region have refuted accusations of the so-called "genocide" against Muslim minorities there, saying such claims dampen the lives they are living now and aim to hamper the region's peace and stability.
